table.name: vtiger_bhscallstrategys
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallstrategy` ( `bhscallstrategyid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscallstrategy_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallstrategyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscallstrategyscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallstrategyscf` ( `bhscallstrategyid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallstrategyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
